title: Reflective Journaling for Design Thinking and Professional Identity Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design concepts and understanding of design thinking processes
context.additional_context: Short intensive course for office/administrative professionals emphasizing practical application. Requires time-efficient learning via mobile devices, considering advanced domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can systematically record and analyze ideas generated during the design thinking process.
Learners can evaluate their design process and construct professional identity through reflective journaling.
Learners can develop collaborative strategies to refine and improve design ideas based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
